toto.plugins.tide.detide¶

Bases: object

detide(mag='mag', args={'Latitude': - 36.0, 'Minimum SNR': 2, 'folder out': '/home/remy/software/TOTO/Toto/docs'})[source]¶

This function detide a timeseries. Works if NaN are in the timeseries

predict(mag='mag', args={'Latitude': -36.0, 'Minimum SNR': 2, 'dt(s)': 60, 'maximum time': <class 'datetime.datetime'>, 'minimum time': <class 'datetime.datetime'>})[source]¶

This function predict the tide by first detiding a timeseries. Works if NaN are in the timeseries
